Gradually increase the amount you're saving each day to a pot of your choice. On 1st January, you'll save 1p. On 2nd January, you'll save 2p. This goes right up to Â£3.65 (or Â£3.66 ðŸ˜) on the last day of the year!

Feel free to jump in part way through the year, and see how far you get!

The challenge resets automatically on January 1st every year.

original_description: Have a fan, portable AC unit, or other cooling device hooked up to a Smart Life plug or outlet? Use this Applet to automatically turn it off whenever the temperature drops below a threshold. Pair this Applet with Applet HZCxKUhq (https://ifttt.com/applets/HZCxKUhq-turn-on-a-smart-life-device-if-the-temperature-rises-above-a-threshold) to also turn your device on when the temperature rises above a threshold.
